parameters.name: Bandwidth
parameters.description:
The bandwidth for ECC, which corresponds to the bandwidth for the underlying circuit.

Unit: Mbit/s.

parameters.name: ContactMail
parameters.description: The email address of the contact who applies for ECC.

parameters.name: ContactTel
parameters.description: The phone number of the contact who applies for ECC.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description:
The description of ECC.

The description must be 2 to 256 characters in length. It must start with a letter but cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: IDCardNo
parameters.description: The ID card number of the contact who applies for ECC.

parameters.name: IdcSP
parameters.description: The Internet service provider (ISP) for the data center.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description:
The name of the ECC instance.

The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). It must start with a letter but cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: PeerCity
parameters.description: The city where the data center is located.

parameters.name: PeerLocation
parameters.description:
The geographical location of the data center.

> It must be accurate to house number-floor-room number-server rack number.

parameters.name: PortType
parameters.description:
The port of the Express Connect circuit. Valid values:

*   100Base-T
*   1000Base-T
*   1000Base-LX
*   10GBase-T
*   10GBase-LR

parameters.name: RedundantEccId
parameters.description: The ID of the standby Express Connect circuit.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the ECC instance.
